title: Pot of Gold: Episode 6: Grand Final
abstract: Television variety and talent show compered by Tommy Hanlon Jnr with Bernard King as one of the judges.
description: Grand Final of 'Pot of Gold' compered by Tommy Hanlon Jnr. With judges Graham Kennedy and Bernard King. Contestants: band Rainbows End, who are 2nd place getters; Jehosaphat Smith, a novelty act; Robyn Filmer, a dancer; Steven and Amanda, singers; Terri Anne, a contortionist and winner of Roxy novelty prize; Wayne Miller, a young organist who receives the encouragement award; comedienne, Ros Dorrington; dancer, Louise Dowling; singer, Pamela Ryler, who takes 1st place; Ted and Lola Sims and their Wonder Dogs (poodles).
related_objects: Series; B2001455; Pot of gold; Active; 1975-1978
